description: Rugged for tough approaches, yet light enough to hang on your harness. The La Sportiva TX3 has a full rand for lightweight protection and a Vibram® rubber toe cap for grip when toe-camming in easy terrain. The sticky soles grip granite slabs and the cushioned heel keeps traction on tough descents. The mesh fabric upper keeps your feet cool but is burly enough to last seasons.Upper is polyester mesh for lightweight breathability.Vibram® toe cap and PU rand add durabilty and grip in climbing situations.Lined with non-slip mesh for a secure fit.Compression-moulded EVA midsole has torsional rigidity to support your foot while cushion against impacts.Vibram® Mega-Grip sole is super-sticky for grip on technical approaches.Trail Bite™ heel grips scree and reduces impact forces while walking on hard ground.
name: La Sportiva TX3 Approach Shoes - Men's
